original_text: So Amaziah sent away the soldiers who had come from Ephraim. He told them to go back to their homes. So they became very angry with Judah's people. As they went home, they had angry thoughts.
korean_text: 아마샤가 이에 에브라임에서 자기에게 온 군대를 나누어 그들의 고향으로 돌아가게 하였더니 그 무리가 유다 사람에게 심히 노하여 분연히 고향으로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: So Amaziah sent away the soldiers
He told them to go back to their homes
So they became very angry with Judah's people
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 유다 사람들에게 매우 화가 났습니다
